rows.label: bf08320100_0010
rows.name: It's too early to drop dead.

rows.label: bf08320100_0020
rows.name:
We made it this far. I
don't plan on giving up.

rows.label: bf08320100_0022
rows.name:
Sorry about that. If
Judicium hadn't sunk...

rows.label: bf08320100_0024
rows.name:
...I could have given you
much better treatment.

rows.label: bf08320100_0026
rows.name: Don't worry about it.

rows.label: bf08320100_0028
rows.name:
When human cells integrate
with a Blade's body...

rows.label: bf08320100_0030
rows.name: ...they unlock extraordinary powers.

rows.label: bf08320100_0032
rows.name: I am satisfied with that.

rows.label: bf08320100_0034
rows.name: This is fine as it is...

rows.label: bf08320100_0036
rows.name:
Even if she would hate
this... isn't that right?

rows.label: bf08320100_0038
rows.name: I know she wouldn't have wanted this.

rows.label: bf08320100_0040
rows.name:
Despite that, I need
to keep my "promise."

rows.label: bf08320100_0042
rows.name: I see... Then I'll do the same.

rows.label: bf08320100_0044
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf08320100_0046
rows.name:
Hey, Shin. You're not getting
emotionally attached, are you?

rows.label: bf08320100_0050
rows.name:
I found Iira's remains
in the land of Mors...

rows.label: bf08320100_0060
rows.name: Oh?

rows.label: bf08320100_0070
rows.name:
It contained Blades who had decomposed
without fully becoming Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf08320100_0080
rows.name:
So they lived on for a
while even after sinking.

rows.label: bf08320100_0090
rows.name:
"Be together with humans"...
a certain man said.

rows.label: bf08320100_0100
rows.name:
But in reality, it was "exist
for the sake of humans"...

rows.label: bf08320100_0110
rows.name:
That's the truth God
determined for us Blades.

rows.label: bf08320100_0120
rows.name: And that is the result...
